title: Healing Crystal Sets
description: Browse our unique selection of Healing Crystal Sets! Each set is hand pulled and presented in organza bags or wooden boxes. The New Moon Beginnings Healing set collection is Chakra-inspired to satisfy a wide variety of intentions.
cleaned_text: Welcome to our Crystal Sets Collection. We make a wide variety of genuine crystal and gemstone sets for many different intentions, goals, gift occasions, and more. Our sets include Chakra sets for each of the seven chakra's, as well as 7 chakra sets. Our sets are also made in sizes ranging from small chips to 2" per stone and a variety of forms including tumbled sets, raw sets, chip sets in a bottle, and more.
